subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Once again!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0064_01C9C4C1.2AF6A830
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

There are literally hundreds, if not thousands of these paranormal forum si=
tes popping up all over the place. It seems everyone wants to start their o=
wn site so they can espouse their vast "expert" knowledge and feel importan=
t.

Don't get me wrong, there are a few good ones out there. Now that it ha=
s become easy to start your own forum though, everyone is doing it.

April
=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Zack Widup 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 24, 2009 9:08 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] On=
ce again!






  Nothing surprises me anymore but I really get dismayed at=
 all the so-called experts out there, as you describe. Also, do any of thes=
e people have a sense of humor? Posting the duck voice is hilarious!

  I c=
ertainly ain't no expert. I've gotten quite a few recordings that seem to b=
e real EVP and hundreds of hours of recording with no EVP in them at all.

=
  You'd think with the availability of the inexpensive RS radios that are e=
asily hacked even by people with minimal electronics experience, people wou=
ld go that route instead of wanting boxes from you.

  I for one really hav=
e no interest in being in the limelight. I just do what I do and share it w=
ith a few friends.

  Zack

  On Fri, Apr 24, 2009 at 9:53 AM, Frank Sumpti=
on <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:





     I was on the group My Para,=
 supposedly a social network for paranormal researchers, even cut and paste=
 Haliday is on there telling everyone he has the longest history in EVP. So=
 I post that duck voice under most amusing EVPs, and apparently got banned =
from the group for that. I have had enough of every friggin' idiot with a c=
omputer trying to be the worlds only EVP/Paranormnal expert, thinking they =
can judge what's real evidence. I absolutely refuse to make anymore boxes s=
o some egomanic dweeb can set themselves up as the big expert.  



     Th=
is mostly falls on deaf ears, cuz everyone out there is too busy trying to =
be TAPS, and chasing limelights, not ghosts, and certainly not any knowledg=
e!
